conversation.message: We are applying for a place at Nursery_C. This is our absolute top choice, and we deeply admire your educational philosophy. We sincerely hope to be accepted.
conversation.thought:
I am Parent_C. My top preference is Nursery_C. Given the structure of the market where capacity is 1 for all nurseries, and the priority lists are uniform (Parent_A > Parent_B > Parent_C...), I must assess my chances against higher-priority parents (A and B).
Parent_A's #1 is Nursery_B. Parent_B's #1 is Nursery_A. It is highly likely that Parent_A and Parent_B will apply to their respective top choices in Round 1, as they hold high priority there.
If they follow their true preferences, I will be the highest-priority applicant for Nursery_C (my #1 choice).
Therefore, the optimal strategy is to apply formally to Nursery_C immediately to secure the match.
